subject: Baseball
Football
Fantasy Sports
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ fantasy football league, which this year has 12 teams, builds relationships and allows players to stay in touch in the off-season, when the trash-talking generally picks up.
snippet: The Mets’ fantasy football league, which this year has 12 teams, builds relationships and allows players to stay in touch in the off-season, when the trash-talking generally picks up.
